title: Encyclopedia
description: A book or set of books giving information on many subjects or on many aspects of one subject and typically arranged alphabetically.

title: Telescope
description: A device used to observe distant objects by their emission, absorption, or reflection of electromagnetic radiation. It contains a really powerful lens.

title: Grand Piano
description: A large piano whose strings are set horizontally to the ground. Grand pianos are used especially for giving concerts and making recordings.
